experience.title: Freelancing
experience.description: Developed Python and AutoHotkey scripts to automate tasks for clients. Took commissions for programming projects in Python, Java and C#, offered mentoring in programming, game development (level design, sound design, general game design) and software design. Offered video game QA testing for clients.

experience.title: BUDMA Trade
experience.description: Created CAD designs for aluminum doors and windows based on specifications provided by the client. Communicated and provided clients with quotes, ensuring client satisfaction and assisting in making the right choices. Actively consulted with the production team. Developed AutoHotkey automation scripts, speeding up the general workflow by eliminating repetition.

experience.title: ReaperMC
experience.description: Founded and maintained ReaperMC, an ecosystem of high-level APIs, libraries and frameworks developed for the Bolt scripting language, allowing for a more streamlined and structured workflow inside the language. Features custom high-level abstractions and functions, a math library, a comprehensive event handler system supporting user-defined custom events, taking advantage of a language-hack optimizations. Wrote comprehensive technical documentation for the project. Pioneered various concepts inside the Bolt ecosystem community, of which the impact can be seen until today.

experience.title: Logdotzip Studios
experience.description: Developed immersive experiences inside of Minecraft for a famous channel network on YouTube. Created custom 2D pixel-art textures from scratch. Created and animated 3D models using Blockbench. Programmed in functionality for custom items and entities using datapacks, leveraging the Bolt scripting language and ReaperMC to speed up development. Utilized level design knowledge and tricks to make a visually engaging experience for the viewer.
